import React from 'react'; import { Button, Icon, Grid, Header, Segment, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { Link } from '../routes'; const LandingPage = () => { // Data for feature boxes const features = [ { title: "Secure", description: "Votes cannot be altered or deleted" }, { title: "Transparent", description: "Public ledger for full traceability" }, { title: "Private", description: "Anonymous voting" }, { title: "Fast", description: "Real-time results" } ]; return (
{/* --- Hero Section --- */}

BLOCKCHAIN VOTING SYSTEM

A secure, transparent and tamper-proof voting solution powered by blockchain technology.

Every vote counts. Every vote is verifiable. Every vote is immutable.

{/* --- Features Section (Simplified with map) --- */}

Key Features

{features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* --- How It Works Section --- */} {/* ... (keep your existing how-it-works content) ... */} {/* --- Footer --- */} {/* ... (keep your existing footer) ... */}
); }; export default LandingPage;
